metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3612 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox component in OracleVirtualization VirtualBox before 5.0.22 allows remote attackers to affectconfidentiality via vectors related to Core.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3612` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

virtualbox - 5.0.22
virtualbox-dkms - 5.0.22
virtualbox-guest-dkms - 5.0.22
virtualbox-guest-source - 5.0.22
virtualbox-guest-utils - 5.0.22
virtualbox-guest-x11 - 5.0.22
virtualbox-qt - 5.0.22
virtualbox-source - 5.0.22
No subscription required

criterions.comment: virtualbox package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.22').
